definition: as quickly as possible/as soon as possible/with all speed
see 儘快|尽快[jin3 kuai4]
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
rapid/quick/speed/rate/soon/almost/to make haste/clever/sharp (of knives or wits)/forthright/plainspoken/gratified/pleased/pleasant

sentences.english: Limited seats offered in first-served basis. Please fill in the form and return as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 名额有限先到先得方法取录，请尽快填妥寄回。

sentences.english: The police are also urging him to have his daughter's body cremated quickly, he said.
sentences.chinese: 警察还极力敦促他尽快将女儿的遗体火化，陈广干说。

sentences.english: Make sure that fish or other seafood are wrapped and use as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 切记鱼或其他海鲜要包装好，并且尽快食用。

sentences.english: Odysseus sets sail as soon as the sun goes down.
sentences.chinese: 奥德修斯集帆尽快在日落时分。

sentences.english: We agreed on the importance of resuming the six-party talks as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们一致认为尽快恢复六方会谈是重要的。

sentences.english: Mr Chen said he hoped cro -strait dialogue could resume quickly.
sentences.chinese: 陈水扁表示希望两岸能够尽快恢复对话。

sentences.english: I want to buy auto filter . please and contact us.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要购买汽车滤清器，请尽快与我们联系。

sentences.english: I'm just wearing this coat out so that I can have a new one sooner.
sentences.chinese: 我正尽快把这件旧上衣穿够本，以便早一点换件新的。

sentences.english: If interested, please RSVP to me by the end of next week.
sentences.chinese: 如果有意参加，请在下周末前尽快联系我。

sentences.english: Letwis do the pattern drill. You must respond asap.
sentences.chinese: 我们做句型练习，你们必需尽快做出反映。

sentences.english: Wish God leads them to the way to reborn…
sentences.chinese: 愿他们能尽快找到轮廻的道路。

sentences.english: These two worlds need to be reintegrated as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 这两个世界必须尽快重新成为一体。

sentences.english: The front drawworks guard should be put back in place when the operation is completed.
sentences.chinese: 作业结束之后，要尽快把绞车前边的护罩装回原处。

sentences.english: He says he is confident about his own integrity, and hopes the judicial system will quickly investigate the matter.
sentences.chinese: 他也强调对自己的操守有信心，希望司法尽快侦办。

sentences.english: Catalpa Po for repair units as soon as possible the owner, the owner of lining.
sentences.chinese: 梓博要求业主尽快维修单位，业主诸多推搪。

sentences.english: The light green Pantong No and Art worts, please send them to me asap!
sentences.chinese: 请尽快给我浅绿色的色标号和图片文件。

definition: as early as possible
soon/shortly/on a day quite soon/promptly
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
to snatch time/to rush/to hurry (up)/to seize the moment
at the earliest possible time/as soon as possible
top priority job/matter of vital importance
so that/so as to/in order to
in time/promptly/without delay/timely
in the first moments (of sth happening)/immediately (after an event)/first thing
to adopt measures/to take steps
as far as possible/to do one's utmost
to grasp firmly/to pay special attention to/to rush in/to make the most of
to try/to make an attempt/to think of a way (to accomplish sth)
to wish for/to desire/hope/CL:個|个[ge4]
to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
temporary/provisional/for the time being
